name: Incremental TD
description:
I am by no means professional or even skilled in making games with unity, I just do this for fun when I have free time from work (being bezos's wage slave), I have many things planned for the game.

O yeah to do this much i'm following brackey's tutorial on TD games, can recommend them.

Edit: Virustotal (Opens in new tab) for IncrementalTDWindows-x86_64.rar

Edit: Unity and code showcase vid

Stuff for the game:

I think the game is for 64 bit processors only and for Windows, sorry 32 bit and linux enjoyers or mac users.
Game res is still 1600x900, no settings menu to change resolution, just rezise the window

Camera controls - WASD, RMB to change facing of camera (a bit wonky, have to fix at some point) - still the same.

Enemies: currently only a basic enemy - no changes here yet.

Towers: 

  • Strength (Red color)
  • Agility (Green color)
  • Intelligence (Blue color) 
  • To select tower type click on the button under the red sphere on left side of the game screen.

Automatic wave spawning enable/disable - while hovering with the mouse over the button to start wave press Q - still same.

Evies - your money, you get +3 per kill and +70 per wave completed (Now awards per wave completed instead of wave started).

23/11/2021 - QoL changes, fixed some bugs and made automatic/manual wave management work a bit better, re-organized my unity stuff, added health and a end-game by dying.

22/11/2021 - Initial release.
